about_the_game:
Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You plunges players into a chilling first-person horror experience set within the eerie depths of a dense forest. Stranded and alone, you must navigate your way home on foot while being relentlessly pursued by amorous monkeys with a penchant for unwanted kisses.

Embark on a harrowing journey through the shadowy woods, where every step is fraught with peril. As you traverse the ominous forest paths, haunted by the ominous specter of a malevolent monkey, you'll face daunting challenges and unnerving encounters at every turn.

Abandoned by your companion in the aftermath of a chilling encounter, you find yourself grappling with fear and uncertainty as you strive to reach the safety of home. Yet, the sinister intentions of the relentless monkey loom ever closer, threatening to ensnare you in its disturbing embrace.

Can you outmaneuver the relentless advances of your simian pursuers and survive the nightmarish ordeal? Brace yourself for a pulse-pounding adventure where every decision could mean the difference between life and a fate sealed with a chilling kiss.

Features:

Intense first-person horror gameplay set in a haunting forest environment.
Navigate treacherous paths and overcome terrifying obstacles.
Encounter unsettling creatures and face your deepest fears.
Unravel the mysteries of the forest as you fight for survival.
Experience a gripping narrative filled with tension and suspense.
Prepare yourself for an immersive and unforgettable experience where the line between reality and nightmare blurs, and the only certainty is the ever-present threat of a monkey's unsettling affection.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, ATI 7950 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 2060, AMD Radeon RX 6700, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Gamepad or Controller

short_description: Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You is a gripping first-person horror adventure. Stranded in a sinister forest, evade amorous monkeys while navigating treacherous paths. Face chilling encounters, uncover mysteries, and fight for survival in this pulse-pounding tale of fear and tension.
